General.Name: CPanel PCL
General.Description: CPanel Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes precast concrete slabs and walls, and building components for construction industry. It also offers prefabricated beams and stairs. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is headquartered in Chonburi, Thailand.
General.Address: No.85 Moo.9 Tumbol Nhong I-run, Chonburi, Thailand, 20220
